errors.error_description: Listed unnecessary heavy dependencies like TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenCV that are not actually required for PyLabRobot
correction_candidates: To install PyLabRobot, simply run: pip install pylabrobot
PyLabRobot has minimal dependencies and can be installed with: pip install pylabrobot
To install PyLabRobot, you need Python 3.8+ and can install with: pip install pylabrobot
PyLabRobot requires only standard Python libraries and can be installed with: pip install pylabrobot
errors.golden_answer: PyLabRobot has minimal dependencies and can be installed with: pip install pylabrobot
